sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { BigNumber } from 'ethers' import { Modal, Form, InputGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { User } from '../../services/types' import { approvexMana, approveMana } from '../../services/utils' interface IndexProps { show: boolean, onHide: () => void, user: User, setShow: (arg0: boolean) => void, setTxShow: (arg0: boolean) => void, setPendingHash: (arg0: string | undefined) => void, approve: (arg0: User, arg1) => void, } const Index: React.FC = ({ show, onHide, user, setShow, setTxShow, setPendingHash, }: IndexProps) => { const [value, setValue] = useState(null) let decimals = BigNumber.from(18) decimals = BigNumber.from(10).pow(decimals) const handleApprove = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() if (value === 0) { return } const tx = await approvexMana( user, BigNumber.from(parseInt(value, 10)).mul(decimals), ) setPendingHash(tx) setShow(false) setTxShow(true) } return ( Approve
setValue(e.target.value)} type="number" /> DAI
) } export default Index
